name: Bahamas
description: A tropical paradise known for its clear turquoise waters, white sandy beaches, and vibrant island culture.

name: Rome
description: Italy’s capital city, rich with ancient history, stunning architecture, and the iconic Colosseum and Vatican City.

name: Antarctica
description: The coldest, driest, and windiest continent on Earth—home to incredible glaciers, penguins, and endless ice landscapes.

name: Tokyo
description: Japan’s bustling capital, where futuristic skyscrapers meet ancient temples, and culture blends with cutting-edge technology.

name: Paris
description: The romantic city of lights, celebrated for the Eiffel Tower, art museums, and charming cafes along the Seine.

name: New York
description: The city that never sleeps, famous for its skyline, Times Square, and the cultural diversity of its neighborhoods.
